Name: First Lord of the Star League
Details: The head of the state of the Star League, the First Lord was considered first among equals within the Lords of the High Council that ruled mankind's largest star empire. There have been only six First Lords and all members of House Cameron, the lords of the Terran Hegemony, starting with Ian Cameronin 2571 and ending with the death of Richard Cameron in 2766 during the coup by Stephan Amaris.
